data.message:
Sorry, my fan page category was originally a dancer would like to change into a public figure has been unable to change, only ran out of local stores or environmental services like the option!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us, ShaSha. You can change your Page's category by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2eWXvtY. If you don't see a category that describes your Page, please choose the closest available option from the categories listed. -Joe
